abilities.name: Miraculous Wind
abilities.effect: As long as Light Dragonite is your Active Pokémon, each Special Energy card provides Colorless Energy instead of its usual type and its other effects stop working. This power stops working while Light Dragonite is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Light Wave
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all effects of attacks that are not damage done to this Pokémon.
